page.title: 11Recreation Clubs Sports
page.content: At the Maresfield recreation ground there are oak trees all round it.When you are in the middle you see a few houses on two sides and the main road on the other side. People play all sorts of games, some play{football, {cricket and stoolball}.Some children play on the{swings}and{slides.The recreation ground even has a pavilion, toilets and benches.They have a {bowling green}and{tennis courts.In their spare time children like birdwatching, making- models or go to clubs like{judo, football,swimming in Uckfield.They also watch{television. Childrens favourites include Blue Peter Dogtanian cartoons.Adults favourites are Dallas,Crossroads and Emmerdale Farm. by Nathan
